name: lytedev-hugo-theme
description: The Hugo theme for my personal site at https://lyte.dev

scripts.build-styles: yarn run mkdirp ./static/styles && yarn run stylus --include ./src/ --use ./node_modules/poststylus --with "['autoprefixer']" --compress < ./src/main.styl > ./static/styles/main.css
scripts.build-scripts: yarn run mkdirp ./static/scripts && yarn run coffee -o ./static/scripts/ --compile ./src/site.coffee
scripts.build: yarn run build-styles & yarn run build-scripts
scripts.watch-styles: yarn run nodemon -e styl -x "yarn run build-styles"
scripts.watch-scripts: yarn run nodemon -e coffee -x "yarn run build-scripts"
scripts.watch: yarn run watch-styles & yarn run watch-scripts

author: daniel@lyte.dev
